newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan auctions 750 mln rupees of 6-month bonds.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan auctions 750 mln rupees of 6-month bonds.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan auctioned six-month federal bonds worth a total of 750 million rupees in an open market operation on Thursday.
It said it had accepted bids worth a total of 750 million rupees for the outright sale of six-month bonds at a maximum cut-off of 16.5 percent a year.
In the previous OMO held on Wednesday bids worth 2.140 billion rupees were accepted for the outright sale of the six-month bonds at a maximum cut-off of 16.45 percent.
